When did the Trans Rights Readathon begin?
March 20
Who is the organizer and activist behind the Trans Rights Readathon?
Sim Kern
What organizations can participants donate to during the Trans Rights Readathon?
Trans Health Legal Fund and local fundraisers
Where can participants sign up for the Trans Rights Readathon?
through this form
Which platforms can participants use for the Trans Rights Readathon?
TikTok, Instagram, Twitter, Twitch, YouTube, and others
What genres of books by trans authors are recommended in the article?
memoir, YA contemporary, magical realism, romance, and more
What is the title of the speculative novel by Marisa Crane?
I Keep My Exoskeletons to Myself
Which book is an epistolary novel about a young trans woman's obsession with a 1960s band?
Summer Fun by Jeanne Thornton
What is the title of the graphic memoir by Maia Kobabe?
Gender Queer: A Memoir
Which book by Aiden Thomas is a groundbreaking exploration of gender and traditions?
Cemetery Boys
